plot outline: Shekar and Jui are happily married since three years.Sheakr is a flute musician and gets a music assignment in France.But before leaving for France he plans a short trip to his village in Konkan along with Jui and his friends.Where everyone realizes unhappiness behind their happy lives.
title: Nirop
plot: Shekar and Jui are happily married since three years.Sheakr is a flute musician and gets a music assignment in France.But before leaving for France he plans a short trip to his village in Konkan along with Jui and his friends.Where everyone realizes unhappiness behind their happy lives.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
